chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
great! currently, i'm standing at the starting point
Hay una ramita a mi izquierda que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿Cómo debo proceder?
go straight away from the treasure box
and a little bit to the right
ok, i'm now moving away from the treasure box
so, should i head toward the tiger or in another direction?
all right, moved a bit to the right
¿Sigo en esta dirección?
no not towards the tiger.  go parallel but away from the tigiger
gotcha! moving parallel but avoiding the tiger
sorry I mean you should go towards the tiger
no worries, i'm changing my direction towards the tiger now
and a little to the left
all right, i just adjusted my path a little to the left
¿Estoy en el camino correcto ahora?
yes
perfect! to what direction should i head next?
keep going until you are to to about the middle of the tiger
great, i'm heading towards the middle of the tiger right now
¿Cuál es el siguiente paso?
go past the tiger towards the parrot
roger that, moving past the tiger towards the parrot now
and go over the top of the parrot
alright, going over the top of the parrot now
then along side of the elephant
Bien, ahora me estoy moviendo junto al elefante.
then move along the elephant and around the bottom of the tiger
understood, moving along the elephant and going around the bottom of the tiger now
then cross the rock bridge towards the frog
crossing the rock bridge towards the frog now
then walk below the frog
alright, now i'm walking below the frog
¿que sigue?
once you pass the frog make a u turn towards the alligator
done, just made a u turn towards the alligator
you need to walk over the alligator
roger that, i'm walking over the alligator now
walk on top of it
yep, i'm walking right on top of the crocodile now
¿próximo movimiento?
then over the black rock
gotcha! walking over the black rock now
and then over the 2 gray rocks to the giraffe
alright, passing over the 2 gray rocks to the giraffe now
just before the giraffe turn left
Lo tengo, girando a la izquierda justo antes de llegar a la jirafa.
then walk a few steps and turn left again towards the snake
okay, walked a few steps and turning left again now towards the snake
cross the water and walk over the snake to the treasure
crossing the water and walking over the snake to the treasure now *finished*

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
cross the log
ok, let's do this
first, take a few steps to the left, go under that wooden bench and across the trail. before you hit the florist stand, make a quick u-turn and head back towards our white dog buddy again
ok
great! now, cross over that branch just south of you, keep moving south
¿Puedes ver otro perro blanco junto a una manta de picnic a cuadros? dirigirse hacia él
ok
next, carefully tiptoe over that picnic mat, giving a little pat to the bowl of berries on your way west
ok
perfect! you're doing really well
Ahora, ¿ves esa rama de madera más adelante? cruzarlo para dirigirse hacia el norte
ok
once you cross the river, don't touch that green bush
just walk around it from the right side until you reach the florist stand
ok
¡fantástico! Ahora gira a la izquierda y pasa por debajo de la tribuna. ¿Ves ese gran puente hermoso con los ciclistas? Dirígete hacia allí, ¡pero no cruces todavía!
ok
ok, now carefully step past the bridge
spot those two elderly folks on the bench? head towards them
ok
awesome
Desde allí, camina unos pasos hacia el sur, entre los viejos y ese tronco de madera, hasta un arbusto verde cerca de la punta del tronco. ¿Seguimos bien?
ok
ok, with that bush and branch behind you, now head east, sliding between them both
cool, huh?

chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
yes
awesome! i'm at a tent right up north. south, there's a pup by a fire with a red mushroom to the right
a bit further down, there's a blue car. where to?
walk towards the dog
alright, moving towards the pooch
ahora estando a su lado. ¿De dónde también desde aquí?
straight down and to right of the dog
moving straight down, and right
now closer to the mushroom. what's the next move, cap?
walk around the bottom of the dog and over the top of the fire
¡Listo, solo pasé el fuego y me aseguré de no pisar ninguna brasa!
then walk below the mushrooms
okay, moving below the shrooms now
i see a blue car, and a long path leading south. end
and towards the path
moving along the path now
fin
then towards the blue car
on it, moving towards the car now!
before you get to the car get on the path
gotcha, i'm staying on the path before the blue car
¿que sigue?
then stay on the path going south until the telescope
alright, sticking to the path southbound till the telescope!
at the telescope walk around the bottom of it between it and the green bush back to the path
roaming around the telescope, staying between it and the green bush
¡De vuelta al camino! ¿Qué sigue?
then on the path walk till you see the house
alright, i'm on the path moving towards the house
got a nice little humble abode in sight! *finished*

chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
yes
awesome! first, let's head south-west and go under the first palm tree. after that, make a neat right turn across the second palm tree
then slice a sharp left before the third tree and head straight south.
ok
¡excelente! A continuación, girarás un poco hacia la izquierda, pero girarás rápidamente hacia la derecha hacia el sur, rodeando ese lindo cachorro marrón que ves.
ok
way to go! now, stroll between the big rock on your left and the little rock on your right
then, make your way towards the water. ready for a dip?
ok
cool, let's make a right turn at the red crab, and swim along the edge of the big rock, heading west
¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
ok
now, you'll soon reach a medium rock. after passing this, brace yourself for mr
shark. but don't panic, just make a sharp turn right. you got this!
ok
nice dodge! now, head back to land, squeeze between that medium rock and funky blue-yellow-white ball and head north
¿No es divertido?
ok
good job! now, sway a bit to your left and keep going to the northwest
we're passing between a red tent and a larger speaker
ok
alright! next, let's take a walk around the tent in a nice arc, then head south again
Continúe hasta que lleguemos al agua, pero no es necesario nadar más, ¡estamos girando rápidamente a la derecha!
ok
advance towards the west, just beneath a red kayak
exciting, ain't it?
ok
nice! finally, make a sharp turn north and stroll along the kayak
tu objetivo es un pequeño arbusto verde. felicidades, lo lograste!
ok
awesome! you did great, buddy!

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: When I at work speaking with parents who do not speak good English
